Author: Jake Koenig
Summary: Btw, I asked chatGPT for feedback on this essay for the first ~3 paragraphs and it was very flattering. But when I prompted it to really go in on my style it said I should abbreviate centimeter to cm ... The string centimeter appeared no where in my writing. Then I gave up
